item.title: Windows 10 Digital Activation v1.5.0
item.description:
Windows 10 Digital Activation v1.5.0 can Activate the Windows 10 permanently with digital License.

  1. You can get digital licence on all windows 10 version including VL editions (except 1507). it will automatically replace any kms licence if present already.

  2. It does’nt install or store any files for activation in your system. so no need to set exclusions in your av for anything.

  3. You will have to connect to internet while using this tool to get activation instantly but It also works offline, but will give an error at the activation step at the end. At next online contact system will activate.

  4. In same hardware, Upon windows 10 reinstall you don’t have to run this tool again and at first online contact the MS Server will recognize the HWID and grant activation automatically. but if Windows 10 VL version is installed, in that case you will have to insert that edition generic key to regain activation. or you can use key-install option in this tool.

The software easily activates all versions of Windows 10 like

  • Windows 10 Home

  • Windows 10 Home N

  • Windows 10 Home Single Language

  • Windows 10 Home Country Specific

  • Windows 10 Home Single Language

  • Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB (2015)

  • Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB (2016)

  • Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB N (2016)

  • Windows 10 Enterprise LTSC 2019

  • Windows 10 Enterprise LTSC 2019 N

  • Windows 10 Professional

  • Windows 10 Professional Education

  • Windows 10 Professional Education N

  • Windows 10 Professional N

  • Windows 10 Professional Workstation

  • Windows 10 Professional Workstation N

  • Windows 10 Education

  • Windows 10 Education N

  • Windows 10 Enterprise

  • Windows 10 Enterprise N

  • Windows 10 Enterprise S

  • Windows 10 Enterprise S N

  • Windows 10 Core

  • Windows 10 Core Country Specific

  • Windows 10 Core N

  • Windows 10 Core Single Language

  • Windows 10 Cloud

  • Windows 10 Cloud N

Screenshot

Usage

1 - Download Windows 10 Digital Activation v1.5.0 from the Download button below, you will be redirected to download from Mega:

Download

2 - Disable the antivirus for a while during activation;

3 - Extract Windows 10 Digital Activation v1.5.0 and run W10DigitalActivation.exe;

Password to unzip: w10activator

4 - When the program opens, click the Activate Windows 10 button. Note: There is no need to change any other program settings.

5 - Wait until it is completed;

6 - That’s it, Enjoy!

item.title: CS:GO/CS2 Cheat Novihacks Advanced 2023 - Undetectable
item.description:
Novihacks Advanced is an advanced version with many features and security compared to the Free version. It has all the features of the Free version and extras. This is a completely rewritten forked version of the advanced one.

                The best cheat available for
     Counter-Strike: Global Offensive and Counter-Strike 2

Novihacks Advanced is more recommended for experienced cheaters, who do Legit Hack, who know the juggling of disguise and the proper setup to not get caught by Anti-Cheats.

There are already several presets in this Novihacks Advanced, but it is always recommended to adjust to find the perfect disguise.

It’s a great Counter-Strike: Global Offensive and Counter-Strike 2 trick. We can say that it is one of the most efficient hacks currently in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive and Counter-Strike 2. It is appreciated and loved for its simplicity and convenience. You can play Hvh or Legit, it’s up to you. This hack is satisfyingly good and will help you in many ways to beat your game.

Anti-Cheats detection level for Novihacks Advanced is too low. However, if you look at the walls, you might fall into Overwatch, and there’s no trick to solving it.

Works with all Windows versions and builds.

Usage

Note: You may need to disable your antivirus if it is detected as malware as it is software that changes game information and can be recognized as malware.

1 - Download Novihacks Advanced from the Download button below, you will be redirected to download from Mega:

Download

2 - Using WinRAR, extract novihacks-advanced.zip to a location of your choice using the password;

Password to unzip: novihacks

3 - Close your “CS:GO/CS2”;

4 - Run “setup.exe” and wait for the window to appear;

5 - Click in button “Launch Novihacks”;

6 - The Novihacks Advanced window will appear in game. Configure Novihacks Advanced to your liking;

7 - Enjoy!

item.title: Adobe Photoshop 2023 24.6.0.573 (x64) + Patch
item.description:
Reimagine reality with Photoshop. Millions of designers, photographers, and artists around the world use Photoshop to make the impossible possible. From posters to packaging, basic banners to beautiful websites, unforgettable logos to eye-catching icons, Photoshop keeps the creative world moving. With intuitive tools and easy-to-use templates, even beginners can make something amazing.

Features

The creative world runs on Photoshop.

Millions of designers, photographers, and artists around the world use Photoshop to make the impossible possible.

Designed for anyone to design anything

From posters to packaging, basic banners to beautiful websites, unforgettable logos to eye-catching icons, Photoshop keeps the creative world moving. With intuitive tools and easy-to-use templates, even beginners can make something amazing.

Not just photo taking. Breathtaking

Whether you are looking for everyday edits or total transformations, our graphic design software offers a complete set of professional photography tools to turn your snapshots into works of art. Adjust, crop, remove objects, retouch, and repair old photos. Play with color, effects, and more to turn the ordinary into something extraordinary.

Power to the paintbrush

Draw and paint whatever you dream up with tools designed especially for illustrators. Paint in perfectly symmetrical patterns. Get polished looks with stroke smoothing. And create with pencils, pens, markers, and brushes that feel real including more than 1,000 from celebrated illustrator Kyle T. Webster.

Symmetry mode

Paint in perfect symmetry with a new mode that lets you define your axes and choose from preset patterns like circular, radial, spiral, and mandala. New Content-Aware Fill experience A dedicated workspace lets you select the exact pixels to use for fills, and Adobe Sensei makes it easy to rotate, scale, and mirror them.

Frame tool

Create shape or text frames to use as placeholders on your canvas. Drag and drop images to fill the frames and they all scale to fit.

Datasheet

Category: Programs
Subcategory: Productivity, Images
Release year: 2023
Language: Multi-Language
Version: 24.6.0.573
Format: exe
File size: 3.53 GB
Activation Method: Patch
System Requirements: Windows 10 or 11 (x64)
Processor: 2 GHz
RAM memory: 8 GB
Disk Space: 4 GB

Requirements

Required Version How to install
Microsoft .NET Framework >= 4.7 Download
Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable Latest Download
WinRAR >= 6.10 Download

Installation

1 - Download Adobe Photoshop 2023 24.6.0.573 (x64) + Patch from the Download button below, you will be redirected to download from Mega:

Download

2 - Run installer from “Setup.exe” folder and complete the installation.

3 - Close program completely (even from system tray)

4 - Important: Disable your antivirus so nothing interrupts activation

5 - In the “Patch” folder, right click on “AdobeGenP.exe” in Release folder and click “Run as administrator”

Password to unzip: patch

6 - Click on “Search” button and select then on “Patch”

7 - Wait till patching is done

8 - That’s it, Enjoy!

item.title: Adobe Acrobat Pro DC 2020 + Path + Keygen
item.description:
Adobe Acrobat Pro DC 2020 is a professional application from Adobe that offers many more features for tinkering with PDF items as well as creating these documents from photos and other files.

This program is, like Adobe Reader, a PDF reader, but it does much more than simply open this type of document, it is a complete manager!

With Adobe Acrobat Pro DC 2020, open, edit, annotate, create signatures, export to multiple formats, password protect, and more! It features, for example, a special reader to transform any PDF document or scanned image into editable text — this can even be done with handwritten files. Extract parts of the text, separate the document into several, save photos in high quality and much more!

Adobe Acrobat Pro DC 2020 is not a tool restricted to those who already work with documents of this type, nor does it “scare” those who are using it for the first time, as is the case with other more advanced Adobe apps. It may take some time before you can test and use all of this program’s tools, but for basic use it is incredibly intuitive.

All Adobe Acrobat Pro DC 2020 tools are translated into Portuguese and it has a central menu that allows you to open and create new documents before even saving what you are working on. In other words, it is practical, easy to use and allows you to work with several files at once. Saving everything is also simple, as it has online and offline options for anyone.

Screenshot

Requirements

Required Version How to install
Microsoft .NET Framework >= 4.7 Download
Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable Latest Download
WinRAR >= 6.10 Download

Datasheet

Category: Programs
Subcategory: Productivity, PDF, PDF Tools
Release year: 2020
Language: Multi-Language
Version: 2020.006.20042
Format: exe
File size: 922 MB
Activation Method: Patch, Keygen
System Requirements: Windows 7/8/8.1, 10 e 11
Processor: 1,5 GHz
RAM memory: 1 GB
Disk Space: 2,5 GB

Installation

1 - Download Adobe Acrobat Pro DC 2020 + Path + Keygen from the Download button below, you will be redirected to download from Mega:

Download

2 - Disable the internet and Antivirus;

3 - Run the “Acrobat_DC_Web_WWMUI.exe” file in administrator mode;

4 - Use the “ADOBE_ACROBAT_PRO_DC_V2015_MULTI-XFORCE.zip” Keygen to generate the serial and activate the program. (Restart Windows if prompted with the internet disabled);

Password to unzip: xforce

5 - Copy the patch to the Adobe Acrobat installation folder and run it in administrator mode;

6 - On the screen that opens, select “Try patching other product (32bit)” and click on Patch (Select the amtlib.dll file if asked);

7 - Install the update by running the file “AcrobatDCUpd2000620042.msp” in administrator mode, and then carry out the Patch process again;

8 - > IMPORTANT: Block the program’s connection to the internet using the firewall;

9 - Once this is done, reconnect your internet normally;

10 - Disable automatic program updates;

11 - Ready!
